original_text: Then Michal took an idol and she put it on the bed. She covered the idol with a blanket and she put a pillow of goat's hair at its head.
korean_text: 미갈이 우상을 가져다가 침상에 누이고 염소 털로 엮은 것을 그 머리에 씌우고 의복으로 그것을 덮었더니

sentences.original_text: and she put it on the bed
She covered the idol with a blanket
and she put a pillow of goat's hair at its head
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 머리 맡에 염소 털 베개를 놓았습니다
